system.description:
Heavy directed-energy man-portable weapon for fire support and light anti-vehicular duties. Its back-mounted power pack counts as two Items for encumbrance purposes, while the attached gun itself is only one (making for three in total when properly mounted).

Bulky: A weapon that has powerful recoil or is simply extremely heavy—this makes it difficult to use effectively in combat by someone of a weak physical stature. Characters with STR 8 or less get a -2 penalty when using such weapons. 

Laser: Susceptible to reflec armor. All personal laser weapons, such as the laser carbine, rifle and pistol, get a -1 penalty to hit when used in environments with a great deal of particulates in the air, like sand, ash or thick smoke. In these conditions, their ranges are cut in half as well. At least up to TL 12, ammunition for ordinary laser weapons uses a separate, rechargeable backpack, considered an item itself for the sake of encumbrance (already accounted for in this entry, if applicable), except for the smaller laser pistol. It is rechargeable from any major power source, such as a ship’s power plant. All lasers also have the Zero-G aspect automatically.

Zero-G: Does not suffer a -2 penalty for firing a weapon in zero-gravity or in hard vacuum conditions. All lasers automatically have the Zero-G aspect, even if not specified.
system.shortdescr: Heavy directed-energy man-portable weapon for fire support and light anti-vehicular duties
